00015 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00016 {
00017 
00018   string stationName;
00019   string tempstr;
00020   vector<double> stationPos(2,0);
00021   int datum; // 0=NAD27, 1=NAD83/WGS84
00022   double bearing; // magnetic
00023   double sd; // standard deviation
00024   vector<string> NAD27_args;
00025   vector<string> WGS84_args;
00026   DFLib::ReportCollection rColl;
00027   DFLib::Proj::Report *reportPtr;
00028 
00029   NAD27_args.push_back("proj=latlong");
00030   WGS84_args.push_back("proj=latlong");
00031 
00032   NAD27_args.push_back("datum=NAD27");
00033   WGS84_args.push_back("datum=WGS84");
00034 
00035   if (argc < 2)
00036   {
00037     cerr << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " <inputfile>" << endl;
00038     exit(1);
00039   }
00040 
00041   ifstream infile(argv[1],ifstream::in);
00042   
00043   if (!infile.good())
00044   {
00045     cout << " Failed to open file " << argv[1] << endl;
00046   }
00047   else
00048   {
00049     while (!infile.eof())
00050     {
00051       infile >> stationName;
00052       if (!infile.eof())
00053       {
00054         infile >> tempstr; // lon
00055         stationPos[0]=dmstor(tempstr.c_str(),NULL)*RAD_TO_DEG;
00056         infile >> tempstr; // lat
00057         stationPos[1]=dmstor(tempstr.c_str(),NULL)*RAD_TO_DEG;
00058         infile >> bearing;
00059         bearing += 9.8;  // hard coded magnetic declination
00060         infile >> datum;
00061         infile >> sd;
00062 
00063         cout << "Station " << stationName << " at (" 
00064              << stationPos[0] << "," << stationPos[1] << ")" 
00065              << " with datum "; 
00066         if (datum==0)
00067           cout << "NAD27";
00068         else
00069           cout << "WGS84/NAD83" ;
00070         
00071         cout << " bearing " << bearing << " sd " << sd << endl;
00072 
00073         reportPtr = new DFLib::Proj::Report(stationPos,bearing,sd,stationName,
00074                                             (datum==0)?NAD27_args:WGS84_args);
00075         rColl.addReport(reportPtr);
00076       }
00077     }
00078     cout << " Got " << rColl.size() << " reports " << endl;
00079     // Give it a bogus initial point
00080     DFLib::Proj::Point LSFix(stationPos,WGS84_args);
00081     try {
00082       rColl.computeLeastSquaresFix(LSFix);
00083     }
00084     catch (DFLib::Util::Exception x)
00085     {
00086       cerr << " Ooops .... got exception trying to compute LS fix: " 
00087            << x.getEmsg()
00088            << endl;
00089     }
00090 
00091     vector<double> LS_point=LSFix.getUserCoords();
00092     printCoords(LS_point,string("Least Squares Fix"));
00093 
00094     DFLib::Proj::Point FCA=LSFix;
00095     vector<double> FCA_stddev(2);
00096     try 
00097     {
00098       rColl.computeFixCutAverage(FCA,FCA_stddev);
00099     }
00100     catch (DFLib::Util::Exception x)
00101     {
00102       cerr << " Ooops .... got exception trying to compute FCA: " 
00103            << x.getEmsg()
00104            << endl;
00105     }
00106 
00107     vector<double> FCA_point=FCA.getUserCoords();
00108     printCoords(FCA_point,string("Fix Cut Average"));
00109     cout << " Standard deviation of FCA is " << FCA_stddev[0] << " longitude"
00110          << " and " << FCA_stddev[1] << " latitude." << endl;
00111 
00112     DFLib::Proj::Point MLFix=LSFix;
00113     try 
00114     {
00115       rColl.computeMLFix(MLFix);
00116     }
00117     catch (DFLib::Util::Exception x)
00118     {
00119       cerr << " Ooops .... got exception trying to compute ML Fix: " 
00120            << x.getEmsg()
00121            << endl;
00122     }
00123     
00124     vector<double> ML_point=MLFix.getUserCoords();
00125     printCoords(ML_point,string("Maximum Likelihood Fix"));
00126   }
00127 }
00128 
00129 void printCoords(const vector<double> &latlon,const string &text)
00130 {
00131   int latfac=1;  int lonfac=1;
00132   char EW,NS;
00133 
00134   EW='E';
00135   NS='N';
00136 
00137   if (latlon[0] < 0)
00138   {
00139     lonfac=-1;
00140     EW='W';
00141   }
00142 
00143   if (latlon[1] < 0)
00144   {
00145     latfac=-1;
00146     NS='S';
00147   }
00148 
00149   cout << " Longitude of " << text << ": " 
00150        << static_cast<int>(latlon[0]*lonfac)
00151        << "d" 
00152        << (latlon[0]*lonfac-static_cast<int>(latlon[0]*lonfac))*60 
00153        << "'" << EW 
00154        << endl;
00155 
00156   cout << " Latitude of " << text << ": " 
00157        << static_cast<int>(latlon[1]*latfac)
00158        << "d" 
00159        << (latlon[1]*latfac-static_cast<int>(latlon[1]*latfac))*60 
00160        << "'" << NS 
00161        << endl;
00162 
00163 }
